overview: Nicole Ray has a crush on Jack so when his Ice Cream Truck passed by she helped lick his vanilla drumstick.  Chastity Lynn is having problems with anatomy class and study buddy Will knows how to show and tell.  Kacey Jordan is a brand new masseuse and Chris shows her what a "happy ending" is all about.  Dani Jensen needs an "A" in class and will convince professor Bailey that she deserves it.  Amber is sun bathing by the pool when her older brother's friend Kevin stops by for some action.
title: Too Big for Teens 3
